subject: Aliexpress order number 3061063112100511 - not received
description_text:
Hello,

A month ago, I placed an order for Simsonn VAM haptic motors on AliExpress
through the Simsonn official store, but to this date, I have not received
them.

When I check the tracking, it looks like the package still hasn't even left
the origin country, which you can see in the attached photo.
All orders that I make through Aliexpress are delivered to my address
within a time period of up to 14 days of the order date, so at this point,
I'm pretty sure that I won't receive this one.

I have tried to contact Simsonn through Aliexpress, but I did not receive
any answer, so I decided to contact you this way, as I already use some of
your products and you helped me in the past through this contact email.

To shorten the communication, in case if you can help me, I would be open
to two solutions.
1) I would be willing to wait for another package to arrive if Simsonn
would be willing to upgrade my order to VAM Pro motors (set of two,
including power supply and attachment plates), which would be a fair call
in my opinion as I have already waited for some time, and I would need to
wait for a new package to arrive.
2) Or if the first option is not possible, I would go for a full refund.


Thank you in advance and best regards!
Vlado Vrlika

conversations.body_text:
Hello,

First, thank you for your answer.
Tracking has not updated for more than 20 days, which seems a bit off.
Also, when I was making the order, the latest expected delivery date was
October 5 (which you can see in the photo I attached in my first email),
and now it is October 15, so 10 days late, and I still have to wait longer
to see if it will even arrive at some point.
If I knew it would be this late (even questionably, will it even arrive),
I'm not sure that I would place the order, as I was able to go for another
brand which I knew I would receive till now.

I went with Simsonn as I have had a really good experience till now, but I
think regarding this order, we are at the point where something needs to be
done, so please check my two proposals from the first email..

Best regards!
